title: SwappyGG
author: SwappyGG
created_time: January 07, 2023, 10:12:00 PMLast edit: January 10, 2023, 05:56:57 PM by SwappyGG
content: EXCHANGE NOW - https://swappy.ggSUPPORT - https://discord.gg/MNsfZggFQkFEATURED ON BLOCKCHAIR - https://blockchair.com/awesome/exchanges/swappy

comments.author: SwappyGG
comments.body: We are inviting you to try our service, if you have any questions - feel free to ask!

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: SwappyGG on January 08, 2023, 10:00:39 PMWe are inviting you to try our service, if you have any questions - feel free to ask!I see that you are claiming strict NO-KYC policy, and you won't ever ask for verification from customers.This sounds good, but can you tell me if you are using some third party centralized exchanges or you have some independent source of funds?In About page you say that your exchange exists from 2017, but domain is registered in 2022.https://archive.is/l0Cts

comments.author: SwappyGG
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on January 09, 2023, 01:34:08 PMQuote from: SwappyGG on January 08, 2023, 10:00:39 PMWe are inviting you to try our service, if you have any questions - feel free to ask!I see that you are claiming strict NO-KYC policy, and you won't ever ask for verification from customers.This sounds good, but can you tell me if you are using some third party centralized exchanges or you have some independent source of funds?In About page you say that your exchange exists from 2017, but domain is registered in 2022.https://archive.is/l0CtsHi! We do have partners that we work with, which isn't an exchange & which does not require KYC. My apologies for the "About page", we didn't intend to be misleading, will be fixed within the day, appreciate you pointing that out.

comments.author: cehav1117
comments.body: Domain age: 0 years, 0 months and 13 daysyou have this display on your website showing the recent transactions you are having which is OBVIOUSLY FAKE https://i.imgur.com/dZGbjph.png because your domain is only less than 2 weeks old and there's no way you're  handling that much of transactionsadded to the FAKE ADVERTISING saying "Since 2017, our mission is to enable the effortless exchange process for everyone" VERY SUS/SCUMMY STAY AWAY

comments.author: SwappyGG
comments.body: Quote from: cehav1117 on January 11, 2023, 02:13:42 PM  Domain age: 0 years, 0 months and 13 daysyou have this display on your website showing the recent transactions you are having which is OBVIOUSLY FAKE https://i.imgur.com/dZGbjph.png because your domain is only less than 2 weeks old and there's no way you're  handling that much of transactionsadded to the FAKE ADVERTISING saying "Since 2017, our mission is to enable the effortless exchange process for everyone" VERY SUS/SCUMMY STAY AWAYThank you for your comment  The 2017 part was already mentioned by someone else, it is now fixed. As for transactions, we are advertising in many channels, not just here, if you don't believe it, there's not much I can do. I already mentioned before, you're free not to use it.

comments.author: cehav1117
comments.body: So what you're saying is that you're processing 10 orders PER HOUR because that's the average number being showncan you prove that or it's just another misleading statement?

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: The website has a nice aesthetic, is responsive to mobile devices, and has a simple background image and color scheme. Although looking at your site makes me think of fixed float, I like that it doesn't support Cloudflare, which fixed float supported. Do you guys have a connection to them (fixed float)?By requiring a copper membership and making a marketable announcement thread, you've demonstrated that you are familiar with how things operate on this forum.

comments.author: SwappyGG
comments.body: Quote from: suzanne5223 on January 12, 2023, 02:45:41 PMThe website has a nice aesthetic, is responsive to mobile devices, and has a simple background image and color scheme. Although looking at your site makes me think of fixed float, I like that it doesn't support Cloudflare, which fixed float supported. Do you guys have a connection to them (fixed float)?By requiring a copper membership and making a marketable announcement thread, you've demonstrated that you are familiar with how things operate on this forum.Thank you for the nice words. We are partners with Fixed Float, but we aren't owned by them.
